comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: In his memoirs, The Story of My Life, Clarence Darrow wrote about his involvement as a defense attorney in this case.

comment.author: 16686233@N00
comment._content: A PDF of the original news story appears here. It references the fact that this is a piano box, but dynamite was stored in it. query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9E03E4D81E31E2...

comment.author: 17913022@N00
comment._content: The McNamara brothers papers, which include some material from Clarence Darrow, are housed at the University of Cincinnati's Archives and Rare Books Library. For more information, check out this online exhibit: www.libraries.uc.edu/libraries/arb/exhibits/mcnamara/intr...
